chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall d : preDTA, increasing_app bool lem (dta_app_ne d)

Premises:
increasing_app : forall A : Set, mRelation A -> (Map A -> Map A) -> Prop
lem = fix lem (m0 m1 : Map bool) {struct m1} : Prop := match m0 with | @M0 _ => match m1 with | @M0 _ => True | _ => False end | @M1 _ a b => match m1 with | @M1 _ a' b' => if (a =? a')%N then leb b b' else False | _ => False end | @M2 _ a b => match m1 with | @M2 _ c d => lem a c /\ lem b d | _ => False end end : Map bool -> Map bool -> Prop
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
preDTA = Map state : Set
dta_app_ne = fun (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool) => dta_app_ne_aux d m m : preDTA -> Map bool -> Map bool
dta_app_ne_def_ok : forall d : preDTA, def_ok_app bool (ensemble_base state d) (dta_app_ne d)
dta_non_empty_states_lazy = fun d : preDTA => lazy_power bool eqm_bool (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) (S (MapCard state d)) : preDTA -> Map bool
dta_non_empty_states = fun d : preDTA => power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) (S (MapCard state d)) : preDTA -> Map bool
semantic_equiv_1_2 : forall d : preDTA, pre_reconnait d prec_empty tnil (rec_empty d)
dta_app_ne_aux_def_ok : forall (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool), def_ok_app bool (ensemble_base state d) (dta_app_ne_aux d m)
lem_transitive = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => forall y z : Map bool, lem x0 y -> lem y z -> lem x0 z) (fun y : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun y0 : Map bool => forall z : Map bool, lem (M0 bool) y0 -> lem y0 z -> lem (M0 bool) z) (fun z : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun z0 : Map bool => lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) -> lem (M0 bool) z0 -> lem (M0 bool) z0) (fun _ _ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) => I) (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool)) (H0 : lem (M0 bool) (M1 bool a a0)) => False_ind (lem (M0 bool) (M1 bool a a0)) H0)...
lattice_bounded_5 : forall (p : prechain bool) (A : Set) (m0 m1 : Map A), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A (M2 A m0 m1)) lem p -> exists p0 p1 : prechain bool, sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m0) lem p0 /\ sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m1) lem p1 /\ lem (M2 bool (prechain_last bool p0) (prechain_last bool p1)) (prechain_last bool p) /\ chain_length bool p0 + chain_length bool p1 = S (chain_length bool p)
lattice_bounded_def_0 = fun p : prechain bool => forall (A : Set) (m0 m1 : Map A), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A (M2 A m0 m1)) lem p -> exists p0 p1 : prechain bool, sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m0) lem p0 /\ sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m1) lem p1 /\ lem (M2 bool (prechain_last bool p0) (prechain_last bool p1)) (prechain_last bool p) /\ chain_length bool p0 + chain_length bool p1 = S (chain_length bool p) : prechain bool -> Prop
lem_antisymmetric = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => forall y : Map bool, lem x0 y -> lem y x0 -> x0 = y) (fun y : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun y0 : Map bool => lem (M0 bool) y0 -> lem y0 (M0 bool) -> M0 bool = y0) (fun _ _ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) => eq_refl) (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) (H : lem (M0 bool) (M1 bool a a0)) (_ : lem (M1 bool a a0) (M0 bool)) => False_ind (M0 bool = M1 bool a a0) H) (fun (m : Map bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) m -> lem m (M0 bool) -> M0 bool = m) (m0 : Map bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) m0 -> lem...
lem_domain_equal : forall m0 m1 : Map bool, lem m0 m1 -> domain_equal bool bool m0 m1
rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil
liste_rec_length_0 : forall d : preDTA, liste_rec_length_def d prec_empty tnil
pl_path_rec_nil : forall d : preDTA, pl_path_recon d tnil pl_path_nil
pl_path_rec_equiv_0_0 : forall d : preDTA, pl_path_rec_equiv_0_def d prec_empty tnil
lem_reflexive = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => lem x0 x0) I (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) => eq_ind_r (fun b : bool => if b then leb a0 a0 else False) (leb_reflexive a0) (N.eqb_refl a)) (fun (m : Map bool) (H : lem m m) (m0 : Map bool) (H0 : lem m0 m0) => conj H H0) x : r_reflexive bool lem
map_mini_mini : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), mini bool lem (ensemble_base A x) (map_mini A x)
map_maxi_maxi : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), maxi bool lem (ensemble_base A x) (map_maxi A x)
lattice_bounded : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), bounded_sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A x) lem (S (MapCard A x))
lattice_bounded_10 : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A) (p : prechain bool), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m) lem p -> chain_length bool p <= S (MapCard A m)
mlattice : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), mLattice bool lem (ensemble_base A x) (map_mini A x) (map_maxi A x)
dta_app_ne_inc_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 m : Map bool), lem m0 m1 -> lem (dta_app_ne_aux d m0 m) (dta_app_ne_aux d m1 m)
dta_app_ne_inc_3 : forall (m0 m1 m : Map bool) (d : preDTA), lem m0 m1 -> lem (dta_app_ne_aux d m m0) (dta_app_ne_aux d m m1)
lem_get_leb : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad) (b0 b1 : bool), lem m0 m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some b0 -> MapGet bool m1 a = Some b1 -> leb b0 b1
semantic_equiv_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> rec_term d a t (essence t d) = true
lem_order = conj lem_reflexive (conj lem_antisymmetric lem_transitive) : r_order bool lem
conservation_5 : forall (d : preDTA) (hd : term) (tl : term_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), S (essence hd d) <= essence_list (tcons hd tl) d (prec_cons a la ls)
Inductive pl_path_recon : preDTA -> term_list -> pl_path -> Prop := pl_path_rec_nil : forall d : preDTA, pl_path_recon d tnil pl_path_nil | pl_path_rec_cons : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_path_recon d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)
iteres_incr : forall (A : Set) (r : mRelation A) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), r x (f x) -> increasing_app A r f -> prechain_incr A r (iteres A f x n)
map_fill : forall A : Set, Map A -> bool -> Map bool
dta_app_ne_inc_0 : forall (p : prec_list) (m0 m1 : Map bool), lem m0 m1 -> leb (pl_non_empty m0 p) (pl_non_empty m1 p)

```coq
```coq
Require Import Coq.Program.Combinators.

Definition increasing_app_bool lem dta_app_ne := forall d : preDTA, increasing_app bool lem (dta_app_ne d).

Theorem proof : 
  forall d : preDTA, increasing_app bool lem (dta_app_ne d).
Proof.
  intros d.
  unfold increasing_app, dta_app_ne.
  induction d; intros; simpl.
  - auto.
  - rewrite <- IHd.
    auto.
Qed.
